parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The keyword that is used for the search.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The website ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~ListSites~~) operation.

parameters.name: ValidOnly
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return only valid certificates.
